document_data.caption: A map showing Zhentil Keep's Inner Quarter outlined in red.
document_data.name: Inner Quarter
document_data.mainbody: The '''Inner Quarter''' was the most influential section within the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Inner Quarter was located at the heart of Zhentil Keep. It was surrounded to the north, east, and west by the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]], and to the south by the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]].
document_data.Description: A wall surrounded the entire quarter. Access through the walls was achieved by a gate on the western wall and another in the northeast. Both connected with the Common Quarter. The walls once towered to a height of {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}}, but shrank to just {{SI|15|ft|long=yes}} over the years as material was used in other construction projects like reinforcing the main outer wall of the city.
document_data.Activities: The wealthiest and most influential people of Zhentil Keep lived within the Inner Quarter. Though walking about at night was generally not a good idea in Zhentil Keep, the Inner Quarter was far safer compared to the rest of the city.
document_data.History: The Inner Quarter lay within the boundary of the original Keep constructed by [[Flostren]] during the 9{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Defenses: [[Zhentilar]] guardposts, barracks, and armories were situated throughout the entire quarter.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The [[Black Altar]]
* The [[Tower High]]
* The [[Arena (Zhentil Keep)|Arena]]
* The [[High Hall (Zhentil Keep)|High Wall]]
* [[The Roaring Dragon]]
